verses.verse: So <S%G3779><s%> let <S%G3049><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> think <S%G3049><s%> of us <S%G2248><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>'s servants, <S%G5257><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stewards <S%G3623><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>'s mysteries. <S%G3466><s%>
Here, <S%G3063><s%> moreover, <S%G3739><s%> it is required <S%G2212><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> stewards, <S%G3623><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they <S%G5100><s%> be found <S%G2147><s%> faithful. <S%G4103><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> with me <S%G1698><s%> it <S%G1519><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a very small thing <S%G1646><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I should be judged <S%G350><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> man <S%G442><s%>'s judgment. <S%G2250><s%> Yes, <S%G235><s%> I don't <S%G3761><s%> judge <S%G350><s%> my own self. <S%G1683><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I know <S%G4894><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> against myself. <S%G1683><s%> Yet <S%G235><s%> I <S%G1344><s%> am not <S%G3756><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G5129><s%> this, <S%G1722><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> who judges <S%G350><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> <S%G99999><s%> nothing <S%G3361><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> <S%G99999><s%> the time, <S%G2540><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will both <S%G2532><s%> bring to light <S%G5461><s%> the hidden things <S%G2927><s%> of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> reveal <S%G5319><s%> the counsels <S%G1012><s%> of the hearts. <S%G2588><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> each man <S%G1538><s%> will <S%G1096><s%> get <S%G1096><s%> his praise <S%G1868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> I have in a figure transferred <S%G3345><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Apollos <S%G625><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> your sakes, <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> you might learn <S%G3129><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to think <S%G5426><s%> beyond <S%G5228><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> are written, <S%G1125><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> none <S%G3361><s%> of you <S%G1520><s%> be puffed up <S%G5448><s%> <S%G5228><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> another. <S%G2087><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> makes <S%G1252><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> different? <S%G1161><s%> And what <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G2192><s%> have that <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2983><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> receive? <S%G2983><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> <S%G2532><s%> you did receive <S%G2983><s%> it, <S%G5101><s%> why do you boast <S%G2744><s%> as if <S%G5613><s%> you had <S%G2983><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> received it? <S%G2983><s%>

You are <S%G2075><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> filled. <S%G2880><s%> You have already <S%G2235><s%> become rich. <S%G4147><s%> You have come to reign <S%G936><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> us. <S%G2257><s%> Yes, <S%G2532><s%> and I wish <S%G3785><s%> that <S%G1065><s%> you did reign, <S%G936><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> might reign <S%G4821><s%> with you. <S%G5213><s%>

For, <S%G1063><s%> I think <S%G1380><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has displayed <S%G584><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> the apostles, <S%G652><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> of all, <S%G5613><s%> like men sentenced to death. <S%G1935><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> we are made <S%G1096><s%> a spectacle <S%G2302><s%> to the world, <S%G2889><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to angels <S%G32><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

We <S%G2249><s%> are fools <S%G3474><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>'s sake, but <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> are wise <S%G5429><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> are weak, <S%G772><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> are strong. <S%G2478><s%> You <S%G5210><s%> have honor, <S%G1741><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> have dishonor. <S%G820><s%>

Even to <S%G891><s%> this present <S%G737><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> we <S%G3983><s%> <S%G2532><s%> hunger, <S%G3983><s%> <S%G2532><s%> thirst, <S%G1372><s%> <S%G2532><s%> are naked, <S%G1130><s%> <S%G2532><s%> are beaten, <S%G2852><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have no certain dwelling place. <S%G790><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> We toil, <S%G2872><s%> working <S%G2038><s%> with our own <S%G2398><s%> hands. <S%G5495><s%> When people curse <S%G3058><s%> us, <S%G2127><s%> we bless. Being persecuted, <S%G1377><s%> we endure. <S%G430><s%>

Being defamed, <S%G987><s%> we entreat. <S%G3870><s%> We are made <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the filth <S%G4027><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> the dirt <S%G4067><s%> wiped off by all, <S%G3956><s%> even until <S%G2193><s%> now. <S%G737><s%>

I don't <S%G3756><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> to shame <S%G1788><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> but <S%G235><s%> to admonish <S%G3560><s%> you as <S%G5613><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> children. <S%G5043><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> ten thousand <S%G3463><s%> tutors <S%G3807><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> fathers. <S%G3962><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> became your <S%G5209><s%> father <S%G1080><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the Good News. <S%G2098><s%>
I beg <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> imitators <S%G3402><s%> of me. <S%G3450><s%>

Because <S%G1223><s%> of this <S%G5124><s%> I have sent <S%G3992><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> child <S%G5043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will <S%G363><s%> remind <S%G363><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%> which are <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> I teach <S%G1321><s%> everywhere <S%G3837><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> assembly. <S%G1577><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> are puffed up, <S%G5448><s%> as though <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G3450><s%> were <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> shortly, <S%G5030><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is willing. <S%G2309><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I will know, <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of those who <S%G3588><s%> are puffed up, <S%G5448><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the power. <S%G1411><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> power. <S%G1411><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G2309><s%> want? <S%G2064><s%> Shall I come to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a rod, <S%G4464><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> love <S%G26><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of gentleness? <S%G4236><s%>
